cause.description:
The reason I started the promote Organ Donor awareness cause is because three people in my life have seen the power of the gift life they almost lost love ones if it was not for a life-saving Organ transplant April is National Organ and Tissue Donation Awareness Month promote Organ Donor awareness to the world
1. Thousands of people are on the transplant waiting list
2. Sign your Organ Donation cards
3. Tell your loved ones you want to be a donor
cause.name: stargifts
